Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client
Deprecated: ShowHide

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAsset
    Base interface for all the assets you can download.
    IAssetManager
    Provides access to Cursors over the Asset data.
    IAssetPermission
    Encapsulates the backplane Download Permission Response for an asset.
    IAssetPermission.IAssetDownloadsPerDevice
    Interface for retrieving information on number of Asset downloads on a particular device of the account.
    IAssetPermission.IDownloadsPerDevice
    Interface for retrieving information on number of downloads on a particular device of the account.
    IAssetProvider
    Provides access to Asset data through a Cursor.
    IBackplane
    Provides access to the Backplane controlled settings and to the public Backplane API's.
    IBackplane.IBackplaneDevicesObserver
    Interface for receiving the array of devices registered on the Backplane for the current user.
    IBackplaneDevice
    Encapsulates how the Backplane identifies a device.
    IBackplaneSettings
    Provides access to the current Backplane configuration and the Backplane Controlled Settings.
    IEvent
     
    IFile
    The interface to flat files in Virtuoso.
    IIdentifier
    The interface to identify assets in Virtuoso
    This base interface reduces the need for passing substantial amounts of data across process boundaries and can be used to uniquely identify an asset and its parent.
    IPushRegistrationObserver
    Enables clients to determine whether a Push Service (Firebase Cloud Messaging - FCM or Amazon Device Messaging - ADM) is available.
    IQueue
    Provides access to the Assets that are queued for downloads.
    IQueue.IQueuedAssetPermissionObserver
    Result of permission check on adding Asset to queue.
    Normally, the download engine acquires any necessary download permissions when the item starts downloading.
    ISegment
    Interface to individual segments.
    ISegmentedAsset
    Interface to segmented assets in Virtuoso.
    ISegmentedAssetFromParserObserver
    Interface for receiving notification when a ISegmentedAsset has been created from a parsed manifest
    IService
    Some calls within Virtuoso require direct communication with the background download service.
    IService.IConnectionObserver
    Observer for when the service connects or disconnects.
    ISettings
    Provides access to the settings which can be configured by the client.
    Observers.IBackplaneObserver
    Interface for receiving callbacks concerning the Backplane.
    Observers.IEngineObserver
    Interface for receiving callbacks about status and settings.
    Observers.IObserver
    The base Virtuoso Observer interface.
    Observers.IQueueObserver
    Callbacks about changes in the download queue
    Observers.ISubscriptionObserver
    Callbacks concerning Subscriptions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EngineObserver
    Provides a base class implementation of the IEngineObserver interface, making private implementation of interface methods optional.
    IAssetPermission.PermissionCode
    Provides permission codes for determining if the download is permitted or not.
    Observers
    Observers used to receive callbacks concerning Virtuoso's download engine (Observers.IEngineObserver), the communication with the C&C Backplane (Observers.IBackplaneObserver), changes to the Download Queue (Observers.IQueueObserver) and Subscriptions (Observers.ISubscriptionObserver)
    QueueObserver
    Provides a base class implementation of the IQueueObserver interface, making private implementation of interface methods optional.
    SegmentedParserError
    Defines the possible errors that can be returned when creating a ISegmentedAsset from a manifest.
    SubscriptionObserver
    Provides a base class implementation of the ISubscriptionObserver interface, making private implementation of interface methods optional.
    Virtuoso
    The main class for interacting with Virtuoso
    Use this class to: Create concrete implementations of Virtuoso asset interfaces Enqueue Assets for download Register observers for notification of Virtuoso events
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BackplaneException
    Thrown when there is a problem with the Backplane settings
    ClientException
    Thrown by implementations in the client package when an error is encountered
    ServiceException
    Thrown when an error occurs with the service connection.
